text: Moonit is an app developer based in New York City. The company launched as a semi-finalist at TechCrunch50 with its flagship product Moonit, a social discovery and meet-up app based on astrology. == History == Co-founders Dana Kanze and Mason Sexton launched an alpha version of Moonit.com at TechCrunch San Francisco. The two met while attending The University of Pennsylvania and launched Moonit while Mason was completing his MBA at Columbia Business School. Moonit launched its first iOS application in October 2011. In November 2014, Moonit Labs announced it has raised $1.5 million in new funding. The company intends to use the funds to expand. ==See also== * Tech companies in the New York metropolitan area == References == Category:Software companies based in New York City Category:Software companies of the United States Category:Software companies established in 2009
title: Moonit
